tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_preferences (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    strategy_id INT,
    investment_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    risk_tolerance ENUM('low', 'medium', 'high')
)

CREATE TABLE InvestmentStrategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
    strategy_description TEXT,
    target_return DECIMAL,
    min_investment_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE UserPreferences (
	user_id INT,
	preference_id INT,
	preference_name VARCHAR(255),
	preference_value VARCHAR(255),
	PRIMARY KEY (user_id, preference_id)
);

CREATE TABLE InvestmentStrategies (
	strategy_id INT,
	strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
	description TEXT,
	target_roi DECIMAL(10,2),
	PRIMARY KEY (strategy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UserStrategies (
	user_id INT,
	strategy_id INT,
	allocation DECIMAL(5,2),
	enabled BOOLEAN,
	FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES UserPreferences(user_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (strategy_id) REFERENCES InvestmentStrategies(strategy_id),
	PRIMARY KEY (user_id, strategy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE investment_strategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    creator_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (creator_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    platform_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (platform_id) REFERENCES platforms(platform_id)
);
